Detailed Description

Base class for an MC2 Module.

Initializes the Module.

Parameters:

useMaps whether this module uses maps or not

virtual int Module::handleCommand (  const char *  input  )  [virtual]
 

Handle a command from the user.

Parameters:
cmd Pointer to string with the command
Returns:
Integer reporting what happened; 0: error ocurred 1: everything ok, -1: quit now
